name: KiwiDesignSystem - Free Demo
description:
Streamline your design process with a straightforward, easy to use design system, all perfect for developing your product effectively and efficiently. Edit and fine tune according to your brand, all possible with the use of Master Components.


In this demo, you'll have access to all color and effects styles, typography and icons with an additional 8 dashboard screens to preview them on.


The full 8 theme bundle features:

  • 12 Main Component categories
  • 4500+ Component states
  • 280+ Open Source Icons, both heavy and light styled
  • Customise everything to suit your brand with the help of Master Components
  • 3 sets of example UI's for Basic, Light & Dark themes and 1 set for Color themes with more to come
  • Responsive design for Desktop and Mobile
  • Variants 3.0
  • Auto-layout 3.0
  • All designed on an 8px based grid


Find out more at kiwisystems.io
